user_query: I'm planning a vacation to a tropical island and I need to exchange some currency. Can you give me the current exchange rate from USD to the local currency of the island? Additionally, suggest some popular cryptocurrency exchanges where I can trade my Ethereum for other cryptocurrencies.

TaskList.description: Determine the local currency used on the tropical island.
Fetch the current exchange rate from USD to the local currency obtained from step 1.
Identify popular cryptocurrency exchanges where Ethereum can be traded.
